channel.title: How do I make a place a safe zone
channel.description: The place I want to be safe is Wild, but I want it to be safe so nobody can attack each other. How do I do this?

item.title: How do I make a place a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Edit the nonWild() method or the isinWilderness() method.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a place a safe zone
